solution_line_template: So, Jenna will receive {jenna_fraction} x {total_roses_hanna_can_buy} = <<{jenna_fraction}*{total_roses_hanna_can_buy}={jenna_roses}>>{jenna_roses} roses.
While Imma will receive {imma_fraction} x {total_roses_hanna_can_buy} = <<{imma_fraction}*{total_roses_hanna_can_buy}={imma_roses}>>{imma_roses} roses.
Therefore, Hanna gives a total of {jenna_roses} + {imma_roses} = <<{jenna_roses}+{imma_roses}={total_roses_given_to_friends}>>{total_roses_given_to_friends} roses to her friends.
